attributes.action: ignore the petition entitled 'Require mandatory installation of GPS speed-restrictors, radar-braking, squark-box & remote braking technology on all new vehicles'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has no business in restricting what someone may do with their car and even if these restrictions were made to vehicles only while they were on the public highways it would be an invasion of that person's freedom.

rejection.details: We do not acept petitions on petitions. You may request a counter action to that requested in another petition.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
